articles.title: Rivian (RIVN) Valuation Revisited as R2 SUV, Autonomy and Custom Silicon Fuel Renewed Investor Optimism
articles.mainIdea: Rivian (RIVN) Valuation Revisited as R2 SUV, Autonomy and Custom Silicon Fuel Renewed Investor Optimism
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Rivian (RIVN) Valuation Revisited as R2 SUV, Autonomy and Custom Silicon Fuel Renewed Investor Optimism. Rivian Automotive (RIVN) shares have been riding a wave of optimism as investors focus on the upcoming R2 midsize SUV and the company’s push into custom silicon, autonomy, and broader AI driven software. See our latest analysis for Rivian Automotive. That excitement is showing up in the numbers, with a roughly 46 percent 30 day share price return and a 64 percent year to date share price return pushing Rivian to about $21.75, while its 1 year total shareholder return of around 58 percent...

articles.summary: Benzinga: PYPL, DJT, MU And More: 5 Stocks Investors Couldn't Stop Buzzing About This Week. The stocks, PayPal Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL), Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. (NASDAQ:DJT), Micron Technology Inc. (NASDAQ:MU), Rivian Automotive Inc. (NASDAQ:RIVN), and Nike Inc. (NYSE:NKE), spanning finance, crypto, semiconductors, AI, automotive, and sports, reflected diverse retail interests. Don't Miss: If the Related tickers mentioned: MU, NKE, PYPL.

articles.title: Nat-Gas Prices Fall on Warmer US Weather
articles.mainIdea: Nat-Gas Prices Fall on Warmer US Weather
articles.summary: Barchart: Nat-Gas Prices Fall on Warmer US Weather. January Nymex natural gas (NGF26 ) on Monday closed down -0.019 (-0.48%). Jan nat-gas prices fell on Monday amid warmer US weather, which will dampen heating demand for nat gas. Commodity Weather is forecasting above-normal temperatures for much of the US, with a possibility of colder weather in the Midwest,... Related tickers mentioned: NG=F.

articles.title: Crude Oil Prices Higher on Oil Tanker Disruptions
articles.mainIdea: Crude Oil Prices Higher on Oil Tanker Disruptions
articles.summary: Barchart: Crude Oil Prices Higher on Oil Tanker Disruptions. January WTI crude oil (CLF26) on Monday closed up +0.51 (+0.91%), and January RBOB gasoline (RBF26) closed up +0.0340 (+1.99%). Crude oil on Monday rallied on geopolitical risks in Venezuela and Ukraine-Russia. Other bullish factors included the weaker dollar and the stronger stock market.
